name: Zen Juice
description:
Zen Juice is a virtual reality island adventure game for anyone who has ever wanted to talk to fruit. Learn your powers of telekinesis and gluing as you explore the island and find out what happened to all of its residents. Complete the four main puzzles to restore balance to the island and uncover its secrets.

Game is meant to be played with an Xbox One or Xbox 360 Controller or Oculus Rift.

**Alternative keyboard and mouse controls are WASD for movement, G for gluing, Space to jump, shift to sprint, JKLIUO for object rotation, P to pause the game, right mouse click for picking up and dropping objects, and mouse scrolling for translating objects.
